languages.text: С высоты бесконечности Лорд-капитан рухнул{mf||а} на дно бурлящей бездны. В следующее мгновение {name} заметил{mf||а} две фигуры посреди клубящегося бурого тумана. Одна — неестественно тощая и высокая — стискивала в когтях фигуру поменьше, что-то гневно выкрикивая.

traits.locale_text: С высоты бесконечности Лорд-капитан падает на дно бурлящей бездны и разбивается в кровавое месиво... Но тут же по кусочкам собирается вновь, словно ничего и не было. Шок от падения мгновенно проходит, как только Лорд-капитан замечает две фигуры посреди клубящегося бурого тумана. Одна — неестественно тощая и высокая — стискивает в когтях фигуру поменьше и что-то гневно выкрикивает.

languages.text: The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.
languages.original_text: С высоты бесконечности Лорд-капитан рухнул{mf||а} на дно бурлящей бездны. В следующее мгновение {name} заметил{mf||а} две фигуры посреди клубящегося бурого тумана. Одна — неестественно тощая и высокая — стискивала в когтях фигуру поменьше, что-то гневно выкрикивая.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a boiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a boiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンはとてつもない高さから沸き立つ奈落の底まで落ちた。次の瞬間、{name}は淀んだ霧がうねる中心にふたりの人影を見た。不自然に痩せこけた長身の影が、小柄な影を爪でつかみ、激しく咆哮していた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンはとてつもない高さから沸き立つ奈落の底まで落ちた。次の瞬間、{name}は淀んだ霧がうねる中心にふたりの人影を見た。不自然に痩せこけた長身の影が、小柄な影を爪でつかみ、激しく咆哮していた。

languages.text: 舰长大人从难以估计的高空中，坠落到了不断翻腾的深渊底部。下一刻，{name}看到两个身影浮现在翻腾的红褐色雾气之中。其中一个身影异常憔悴、高大，正用爪子紧紧抓住另一个较小的身影，暴怒地尖叫着。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人从难以估计的高空中，坠落到了不断翻腾的深渊底部。下一刻，{name}看到两个身影浮现在翻腾的红褐色雾气之中。其中一个身影异常憔悴、高大，正用爪子紧紧抓住另一个较小的身影，暴怒地尖叫着。

languages.text: En atterrissant lourdement au fond des abysses tourbillonnants, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a eu l'impression d'avoir fait une chute de plusieurs centaines de mètres. Dans la brume rouge sombre qui l'entourait, il lui a semblé distinguer deux silhouettes : l'une d'elles, anormalement grande et émaciée, semblait agripper l'autre, plus petite, entre ses griffes tout en hurlant à pleins poumons.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

traits.locale_text: En atterrissant lourdement au fond des abysses, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a eu l'impression d'avoir fait une chute de plusieurs centaines de mètres. Dans la brume rouge sombre qui l'entourait, il lui a semblé distinguer deux silhouettes : l'une d'elles, anormalement grande et émaciée, semblait agripper l'autre, plus petite, entre ses griffes tout en hurlant à pleins poumons.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se precipitó desde una altura inconmensurable y dio con sus huesos en el fondo de un turbio abismo. Al cabo de un instante, {name} vio dos figuras en la nebulosa granate. Una de ellas, muy alta y sobrenaturalmente demacrada, tenía cogida con sus garras a la más pequeña y le gritaba furiosa.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se precipitó desde una altura inconmensurable y dio con sus huesos en el fondo de un bullente abismo. Al cabo de un instante, {name} vio dos figuras en la nebulosa granate. Una de ellas, muy alta y sobrenaturalmente demacrada, tenía cogida con sus garras a la más pequeña y le gritaba furiosa.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain krachte aus unermesslicher Höhe auf den Boden eines kochenden Abgrunds. Im nächsten Augenblick sah {name} in dem wabernden kastanienbraunen Nebel zwei Gestalten. Eine der Gestalten, unnatürlich hager und groß, hielt die kleinere in ihren Klauen umklammert und schrie ungezügelt.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain krachte aus unermesslicher Höhe auf den Boden eines kochenden Abgrunds. Im nächsten Augenblick sah {name} in dem wabernden kastanienbraunen Nebel zwei Gestalten. Eine der Gestalten, unnatürlich hager und groß, hielt die kleinere in ihren Klauen umklammert und schrie ungezügelt.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, akıl almaz bir boşluktan çalkantılı bir hiçliğin dibine düştü. Çok geçmeden {name}, dalgalı ve bordo rengi sisin ortasında iki silüet gördü. Silüetlerden biri anormal bir şekilde sıska ve uzun boylu, diğeri daha ufak tefekti. Uzun boylu olan, diğerini pençeleriyle sıkıca tutmuş, öfkeyle bağırıyordu.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain crashed from an immeasurable height to the bottom of a roiling abyss. In the next moment, {name} saw two figures amid the billowing maroon mist. One of the figures, unnaturally gaunt and tall, was clutching the other, smaller one in its claws, screaming furiously.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, akıl almaz bir boşluktan çalkantılı bir hiçliğin dibine düştü. Çok geçmeden {name}, dalgalı ve bordo rengi sisin ortasında iki silüet gördü. Silüetlerden biri anormal bir şekilde sıska ve uzun boylu, diğeri daha ufak tefekti. Uzun boylu olan, diğerini pençeleriyle sıkıca tutmuş, öfkeyle bağırıyordu.
